summary: Adds a new Elf race to play. I have tried to be lore friendly and have a conjuration style elf race.
descriptionHtml:
INSTALL: Preferably use NMM and just download and activate the .esp
UNINSTALL: You all know how to uninstall .esp files :p

Name: Shenmer or Sand Elves.
Height: A bit taller than Altmer.
Skill bonuses: Conjuration +10
Light Armour +5
Enchanting +5
Archery +5
Sneak +5
One Handed +5

Their racial ability (which isn't shown as an ability) is "Desert survival" which gives them a starting carry weight of 350.
Their racial power is "Spirit Link" which is essentially a summon familiar greater power. The effect lasts for 3 minutes.

This is still very much a work in progress. Any suggestions, feedback and criticism will be noted. (I am on this site every day so you will get a prompt reply!).

REPORT ANY AND ALL BUGS! This is my first ever mod but I will try to fix any bugs or problems I can. At the moment it is impossible to become a vampire. This isn't a bug, I just haven't had time to create a vampire version of the race. SO DONT TRY IT!

The boring stuff:
DO:
-Download this mod!
-Endorse this mod!
-ENJOY this mod!
-Give me feedback on this mod!

DON'T:
-Upload this mod claiming it to be your own!
-Use assets in this mod in your own mod without asking me first! (Including translations!)

If you want to feature this mod in any monetised/monetized YouTube video, PLEASE ask me first AND credit me as the author of the mod in the description and if possible the actual video itself.
author: KhaosKid
